about_the_game:
"In the carnival of life, I have pondered since youth, what's the essence of this wild ride?"

A thrilling, poignant story-driven experience about a daughter who returns to her childhood home after receiving a letter that her estranged mother has left something mysterious.

Key Features

  • A first-person narrative adventure where you explore, interact, and immerse yourself in a mystery-driven tale around love, hope and... paranormal?
  • For fans of Firewatch, Gone Home, What Remains of Edith Finch and Dear Esther.
  • A contemplative, non-linear narrative recounted by the future self of a reflective narrator.
  • Meticulously handcrafted environments for you to explore.
  • A gripping, edge-of-your-seat mystery with secrets yet to be unfolded.
??ehh
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


You play as Millie, an anxious yet beautiful soul, just like any of us but…


a vulnerable runaway turned a successful artist trying to make sense of something so incomprehensible.


with a disbelief past so profound that haunts her with thoughts round the clock while things don't make sense anymore...


Why she knew that her mom passed away only months later? What her estranged mother has left for her? What’s haunting her? Why she ran away when her single mom was her whole world? Why should life be so dark and meaningless yet beautiful? What’s the point of it all if there is no point to anything that exists or will exist? Why shall this game even exist?

The answer is sometimes, if not always, more than what meets the eye. Maybe beyond

MOON & AWAY
